meaningMnemonic: Pour all of your <radical>alcohol</radical> in the <radical>pool</radical> to <kanji>serve</kanji> all your guests at once! They can all help themselves to as much or as little alcohol as they want! What a great idea!
readingMnemonic: As you <kanji>serve</kanji> your guests (and yourself) you look over and see <reading>Shaq</reading> (しゃく) also trying to serve them. And by serving I mean getting served because he's throwing them into the pool.
